title: Supply Chain Planner
description: In this role, I manage the efficient and timely delivery of goods by collaborating closely with Operations, Customer Service, Inventory, Quality, and Security teams. My key responsibilities include coordinating transportation and order bookings with external partners, resolving supply chain issues, and ensuring accurate documentation for inbound and outbound orders. Additionally, I generate and analyze daily reports to maintain transparency and drive continuous improvement throughout the order lifecycle.

title: Business Analyst
description: Engaged in client meetings to capture and analyze requirements for an internal application developed for a third-party company in the agricultural sector, aimed at simplifying their operations. Designed solutions addressing database, algorithmic, and visual (GUI) aspects based on client needs, and created and prioritized user stories for the project backlog. Led daily and planning meetings (occasionally), as well as refinement meetings, working within a methodology similar to SCRUM. Developed and executed a detailed migration plan, including database mappings, data transformation algorithms, and execution sequencing.

title: Teaching Assistant
description: Facilitated student learning across various university courses, including 'Databases', 'Systems Requirements', and others, by providing guidance and support throughout their academic journey.

title: Business Analyst
description: Engaged in client meetings to capture and analyze requirements for an application designed to simplify human resources management. Designed solutions addressing database, algorithmic, and visual (GUI) aspects based on client needs, and created and prioritized user stories for the project backlog. Led refinement meetings, working within a methodology similar to SCRUM, to ensure the project aligned with client expectations and requirements.

title: Fullstack Developer - Intern
description: Contributed to developing an application designed to simplify human resources management by modifying, extending, and implementing modules, testing the app to ensure functionality and performance, and working within a methodology similar to SCRUM.
